root.line: Alright good, you figured it out, this is just a demo. Using a very loose definition of the word "demo". It's more like a proof of concept.
As such I'm drawing a blank on story. See that satellite, battlestation thing over there? I want you to destroy it.
Those towers look like they're providing it with power. Go for them, and don't die. After that, we can talk some more.
